task.summary: Added CSS Typography and Universal Styles
Prevent user form editing other users, about link removed if logged in, added ALL USERS CSS
Working with tasks: make sure that All tasks belonging to User are deleted along with the user
ADDED: Faker Gem; Sample Tasks + Sample Users; Tasks Layout
ADDED: Tasks CRUD Action; Task access control
Added GEM: 'Humanize Boolean' for boolean conversion to YES or NO
Added костыль для отображения статуса задачи
